text: Bad News Bears is a 1976 American sports comedy movie directed by Michael Ritchie and starring Walter Matthau, Tatum O'Neal, Chris Barnes, Vic Morrow, Jackie Earle Haley and Joyce Van Patten. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures and was followed by two sequels and a 2005 movie remake of the same name. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1976 comedy movies Category:1970s sports movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Michael Ritchie Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Bad News Bears movies Category:American sports comedy movies Category:American coming-of-age movies Category:1970s English-language movies Category:Baseball movies
title: Bad News Bears (1976 movie)
